meanings.definition: Lipopolysaccharides: Large molecules consisting of a lipid and a polysaccharide found in the outer membrane of Gram-negative bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The lipopolysaccharides protect the bacteria from certain substances.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study lipopolysaccharides to understand bacterial defenses better.
meanings.sent3: The lipopolysaccharides threw a party on the bacterial membrane.
meanings.sent4: The lipopolysaccharides acted as the gatekeepers of the bacterial world.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the lipopolysaccharides looked like tiny sugar-coated shields.
